criterias.normal: Mactwist criteria + forward dive + short SAT move + transition to Helicopter + Helicopter criteria
criterias.twisted: twisted during the entry, untwisted by the rotation of the Mactwist
criterias.devil twist: twisted during the entry, untwisted by the rotation of the Mactwist and re twisted before the dive, then untwisted and re twisted again during the connection into heli, must stay twisted during at least 2 rotation of helicopter. Can untwist for the exit
criterias.reverse: immediate transition to a Helicopter in the opposite direction
